item.title: Monad
item.description: :ID: a3e972e0-8db9-4556-9dca-0e4f6a663236 Haskell class Monad m where (>>=) :: m a -> ( a -> m b) -> m b (>>) :: m a -> m b -> m b return :: a -> m a Name Handles Signature Result Errors Either e a -> (a -> Either e b) -> Either e b Maybe Absent values Maybe a -> (a -> Maybe b) -> Maybe b IO Pure/Impure separation IO a -> (a -> IO b) -> IO b State Monadic State State a -> (a -> State b) -> State b Reader Environment Data Reader a -> (a -> Reader b) -> Reader b Writer Writer-Only Data Writer a -> (a -> Writer b) -> Writer b Parser Composing Parsers Parser a -> (a -> Parser b) -> Parser b
